resources.string:
The screen will quickly change colors to try to revive pixels. 

Do not watch the screen. 

There are high chances it will work, but not all stuck pixels can always be revived. 

It is advisable to leave the application work for at least 30 minutes.

Application from Stefano Passador and Marco Menardi
